item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-01-01
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• Having New Years dinner, hopefully we'll be awake long enough to ring in the New Year. — at Legal Seafood #
  • "He lost his head." -Speed, oh boy the 90's had some horrible movies. #
  • 10 years ago I incorporated Brain Scan Studios. Maybe I should do something with it. :) #
  • HAPPY NEW YEAR! #
  • Winter Classic! The Blackbird just flew over the apartment, that guy is loud. #

Powered by Twitter Tools
